name: Siebel eScript: Avoid exception handling on Loops in Functions
description:
This rule reports Functions with exception handling events inside a loop.
It detects presence of (try|catch) inside (while|for|do) loops.
output:
This rule reports Functions with exception handling events inside a loop. It displays:
- eScript full name
- Number of violation occurrences
rationale:
Use appropriate error handling. Appropriate error handling can help maintain optimal performance. Although error handling is important, it also has a performance cost. For additional
guidelines for using error handling in scripts, see 477766.1 (Article ID) on My Oracle Support.
This document was previously published as Siebel Technical Note 514.
remediation: If possible, put the loop inside the try/catch block.
total: Number of added or modified eScripts
alternativeName: Siebel eScript: Avoid exception handling on Loops in Functions
